Package org.ontal.imgutil

Interface OImage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdjustedImage, ExpandedImage, FitImage, LimitedImage, TiledImage
    public interface OImage
    A media to access different transformation strategy implementations specified by Strategy option. All its implementations saves a local copy of the input and output BufferedImage. After executing any of the processing methos a user should call getOutputImage() method to recover the transformed copy.
    Since:
    May 2012
    Author:
    akaine

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      BufferedImage getOutputImage()
      Recovers the transformed image instance.
      void processByDimmensions()
      Processes input image by both height and width specified in Settings.
      void processByRatio()
      Processes input image by height or width size and ratio specified in Settings.

    • Method Detail

      • processByRatio

        void processByRatio()
             throws SettingsException
        Processes input image by height or width size and ratio specified in Settings. Only one - height o width is required, if both are set only width is taken in consideration.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - in case of invalid settings

      • processByDimmensions

        void processByDimmensions()
                   throws SettingsException
        Processes input image by both height and width specified in Settings.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - in case of invalid settings

      • getOutputImage

        BufferedImage getOutputImage()
        Recovers the transformed image instance.
        Returns:
        transformed image
